petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya
resNameAdd:
1) Nur Alom Ahmed and 1 Anr.
    Advocate - Syeda Afroza Akhatar

business_details.Business: Registered as Special (POCSO Act) Case.

Bailor Mokbul Hussain (police bailor) produced accused Nur Alom Ahmed and Nur Islam on receipt of court notice to produce them before the court. Accused persons Nur Alom Ahmed and Nur Islam appeared before the court and by filing petition vide no. 598/19 prays for bail. Perused record. It is seen that  during investigation accused persons are granted pre arrest bail by Hon&#039ble High court and they appear before the court on receipt of the summon. Accordingly both the accused persons namely Nur Alom Ahmed and Nur Islam are allowed to go on bail of Rs. 10,000/- with a suitable surety of like amount with conditions that i. They shall appear before the court along with their bailor on each fixed date.ii. They shall not leave the jurisdiction of Dhubri District without prior permission from the court.       Violation of any condition would amounted to cancellation of the bail. Make ready the copy. B/A is to do the needful.Fixing 09-04-19 for copy and appearance of accused persons.
Both the accused persons are present. Copy ready and furnished to the accused persons. Fixing 30-04-2019 for C/C.
C R Put-up today as PO has handed over charge on transfer.
Charge framed.Issue summon to pw

Accused are  present. Witness Dr. Majida Sultana, Helena Ahmed and Jayeda Begum are present. Witness Dr. Mozida Sultana is examined, cross examined and discharged. The two witnesses could not be examined on the Ptn vide 797/19 Seen the Ptn and allowed with cost of Rs. 500/ Issue summon to witnesses. Fixing 11-07-2019 for evidence.

Accused are present. Accused has filed a ptn vide no. 1014/19 informing that GR case No. 1083/18 and 1091/18 is pending in the court of SDJM (M), Bilasipara are necessary for proper examination of this case so prays for calling for this said record. Seen the petition. Also seen the petition vide 1013/19. Perused the case record . considering all prayer is accepted. Three witnees are present. Due to ptn filed by the accused. the witness could not be examined.
CR Put up today. Accused is absent with steps.
Accused is present. Record as called for not received. Issue remainder.
Accused are present. Call for record not received. Issue remainder accordingly. Fixing 15-11-2019 for record.
Accused are  present. call for record reached in court. Fixing 19-12-2019 for N/O
CR put up today as P.O is on leave.Fixing 03-01-2020 for N.O
Accused are present. Fixing 07-01-2020 for N.O

Accused are present. Perused the case record. It appears that the G.R NO. 1577/2018 has not yet been charge sheeted. Send back the called for record. Issue summon to the witnesses. Fixing 17-01-2020 for evidence.
CR Putup today as P.O is on CL
Both the accused are present. No witnesses are present. Summon issued to witnesses not returned yet. Issue fresh summon to the witnesses. Fixing 04-02-2020 for evidence.
Both the accused persons present. No witnesses are present. Summon issued to witnesses not returned yet. Issue fresh summon to witnesses. Fixing 15-02-2020 for evidence.

Accused are present. Witness namely Aynal Hoque, Helena Ahmed and Jayeda Begum are present. Ptn. vide NO. 321/2020 is filed by the accused that their engaged advocate prays for adjournment. Seen the ptn. Considering for ends of justice prayer is accepted but with  cost of Rs. 300/ each. The witnesses are allowed to go on PR bond. Fixing 25-02-2020 for evidence.

Accused are present. Witness Aynal Hoque and Helena Ahmed are present. They are examined, cross examined and discharged. Witness Jayeda could not be examined due to paucity of time. She is allowed to go on PR Bond. Fix 05.03.2020 fro evidence.

Accused is present. Witness Jayeda Begum is present. She is examined. but her crossed examination is kept reserved due to paucity of time. Issue sumon to the other witnesses. Witness Jayeda is allowed to go on PR Bond. Fix 13-3-2020 for evidence.
Accused are present. Witness Jayeda Begum is present, she is cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to all remaining witnesses. Fixing 25-03-2020 for evidence.

Case is adjourned today as a preventive measure to fight against the outbreak of Novel Corona Virus (COVID-19). Also no hazira (attendance) / petition are also placed by the concerned accused/petitioner/O.P. or learned counsel in this case as Lockdown has been imposed all over.
